001package com.github.sormuras.bach.simple;
002
003import java.nio.file.Path;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007
008/** Describes a source module in a conventional "simple" project space. */
009public record SimpleModule(String name, Optional<String> main, List<Path> resources) {
010  public static SimpleModule of(String name) {
011    return new SimpleModule(name, Optional.empty(), List.of());
012  }
013
014  public SimpleModule main(String mainClassName) {
015    return new SimpleModule(name, Optional.ofNullable(mainClassName), resources);
016  }
017
018  public SimpleModule withResourcePath(String first, String... more) {
019    return withResourcePath(Path.of(first, more));
020  }
021
022  public SimpleModule withResourcePath(Path path) {
023    var resources = new ArrayList<>(this.resources);
024    resources.add(path);
025    return new SimpleModule(name, main, resources);
026  }
027}
